skills.title: Front End
skills.content: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript-ES6, TypeScript, React, React hook, Next.js

sub_projects.title: 1. Accommodation management system development
details: Developed accommodation management system as a member of a six-person team using React, Material-UI, Express.js and MySQL.
Implemented responsive web design to make web pages rendered well on all devices.
Developed reusable responsive calendar component to display, add and update reservations.
Created MySQL Unique Index for log table to avoid date range overlapping of reservations.
Proposed architecture and implement from scratch to reduce routine operations over 30%.

sub_projects.title: 2. Co-Working Space System development
details: Developed locker moudle for Co-Working Space System using React, Material-UI, Express.js and MySQL.
Developed responsive mobile-first web pages to ensure seamless of users' experience on any device.
Implemented access control policy by authentication and authorization to ensure proper allocation of access rights.
Liaised with Product Manager, sought feedback and implemented further customers’ requirements.
Completed this project on schedule and received 95% of positive feedback.
Designed and developed front-end application using React and TypeScript.
Implemented responsive design using CSS Grid and Flexbox.
Deployed above React application in Nginx server in AWS EC2.
Designed and developed front-end part of an accommodation website using Next.js and Ant Design.
Implemented Server-Side Rendering technique resulting in improved response time and consistent SEO performance.
Integrated third party APIs such as Google Maps API for more useful functionalities.
Collaborated with back-end developers to implement new feature developments.
